original_text: And as they were loosing the colt, the owners thereof said unto them, Why loose ye the colt?
korean_text: 나귀 새끼를 풀 때에 그 임자들이 이르되 어찌하여 나귀 새끼를 푸느냐

sentences.original_text: And as they were loosing the colt
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나귀 새끼를 풀고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the owners thereof said unto them
